question: Which of the following movies has became the first Bollywood film ever to release in Saudi Arabia?
explanation: Indian movie \'Gold\' has created history by becoming the first Bollywood film ever to release in Saudi Arabia. The Reema Kagti-directed sports film \'Gold\' is a fictional re-telling of India\'s iconic win at the 1948 London Olympics.  It stars Akshay Kumar, Mouni Roy, Kunal Kapoor, Vineet Kumar Singh, Amit Sadh, and Sunny Kaushal. This film is only the second movie after Rajnikanth\'s  social drama \"Kala\" to hit the theatres in the Gulf country. Saudi Arabia had held a private screening of international cultural phenomenon, \"Black Panther\" in May 2018 to herald the launch of movie theatres in the kingdom and opening them to the public.
